hanzi-su-wiki:
炭

Значения

Древесный уголь

Мнемоника

Уголь добывается в горах 山, а при горении дает пепел 灰.
purpleculture_pinyin:
tàn
wood charcoal; coal
древесный уголь; каменный уголь
rtega_mnemonic:
炭炭RScharcoal, coal, carbon
  • burned 火 wood cut from the side of the mountain 屵
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 山 indicates the sound; 灰 (ashes) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
煤炭 [ méi tàn ]: coal
焦炭 [ jiāo tàn ]: coke (processed coal used in blast furnace)
雪中送炭 [ xuě zhōng sòng tàn ]: lit. to send charcoal in snowy weather (idiom); fig. to provide help in sb's hour of need
炭疽 [ tàn jū ]: anthrax; bacillus
木炭 [ mù tàn ]: charcoal
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 灰 [ huī ] ashes; dust; lime, mortar
heisig_chinese_memo: Burn enough charcoal and you'll have a mountain of ash.
koohiiStory1: Burn enough charcoal and you´ll have a mountain of ash.
koohiiStory2: You get charcoal from volcano ("fire mountain", 火山) ashes.
jp_example_words:
炭素(たんそ): carbon (C)
石炭(せきたん): coal
炭鉱(たんこう): coal mine
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You climb up a mountain and a cliff in search of fire, but all you find is charcoal. You can make fire with the charcoal, but you were hoping to find fire itself. All that climbing for nothing.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You’re angry that you could only find charcoal so you take the charcoal in your hands and you crush it atop the cliff on the mountain. Feel the charcoal breaking in your hands as the wind carries the charcoal dust off from the top of the cliff on the mountain.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After crushing the charcoal, you decide to take advantage of your current location and lay out in the sun for a while to get a tan (たん). Instead of getting a tan though, you catch on fire. Oops.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine lying out in the sun next to the crushed charcoal, thinking you’re going to get tan. You’re very surprised when you actually catch on fire. Hot hot hot!
Ru_Notes: Используется в большом количестве слов, но почти исключительно в значениях "древесный уголь",  "углерод" и их производных. Вторичных смыслов, похоже, не имеет.

Ru_trainchinese: tàn: (сущ) уголь; древесный уголь; (обр.) нищета; (диал.) каменный уголь; сажа, копоть
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ash (灰) under the mountain (山) is coal
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Burn enough charcoal and you'll have a mountain of ash.
humanum_full_description_en:
Save the sound from " fire " and " shore ". The original meaning is charcoal, which is the black fuel made from wood. "Shuowen": "You burn wood. From the fire, save the sound from the shore." "Book of Rites-Yueling": "(The month of the season of autumn) When the grass and trees fall yellow, it is the cutting of salaries for charcoal."

" Charcoal " can mean charcoal fire. "Shu‧Zhongguozhi": "There is Xia Yunde, the people fall into charcoal." Kong Chuan: "If the people are in danger, if they fall into the mud and fall on fire, there is no rescue."

" Charcoal " also means ash. "Zhou Li‧ Qiuguan‧ Chishang Family": "Put away the wall house with palms and attack them with mirages." Jia Gongyan said: "A mirage is a mirage."

" Charcoal " also means coal. "Historical Records: Family of Foreign Relations": "(Young Master) went into the mountains to make charcoal for his lord. There were more than a hundred people lying down on the bank at dusk.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " fire " to the " shore ", the original meaning is charcoal, which is the black fuel made from wood.
humanum_full_description:
從「火」，「岸」省聲，本義為木炭，即由木材燒成的黑色燃料。《說文》：「燒木餘也。从火，岸省聲。」 《禮記‧月令》：「（季秋之月）草木黃落，乃伐薪為炭。」

　　「炭」可表示炭火。《書‧仲虺之誥》：「有夏昏德，民墜塗炭。」孔傳：「民之危險，若陷泥墜火，無救之者。」

　　「炭」也表示灰。《周禮‧秋官‧赤犮氏》：「掌除牆屋，以蜃炭攻之。」賈公彥疏：「蜃炭者，謂蜃灰是也。」

　　「炭」還表示煤炭。《史記‧外戚世家》：「（少君）為其主入山作炭，暮臥岸下百餘人，岸崩，盡壓殺臥者，少君獨得脫。」
humanum_short_description: 從「火」，「岸」省聲，本義為木炭，即由木材燒成的黑色燃料。

從「 火 」，「 岸 」省聲，本義為木炭，即由木材燒成的黑色燃料。《說文》：「燒木餘也。从火，岸省聲。」 《禮記‧月令》：「（季秋之月）草木黃落，乃伐薪為炭。」 「 炭 」可表示炭火。《書‧仲虺之誥》：「有夏昏德，民墜塗炭。」孔傳：「民之危險，若陷泥墜火，無救之者。」 「 炭 」也表示灰。《周禮‧秋官‧赤犮氏》：「掌除牆屋，以蜃炭攻之。」賈公彥疏：「蜃炭者，謂蜃灰是也。」 「 炭 」還表示煤炭。《史記‧外戚世家》：「（少君）為其主入山作炭，暮臥岸下百餘人，岸崩，盡壓殺臥者，少君獨得脫。」

炭字的基本解释

炭
tàn
把木材和空气隔绝，加高热烧成的一种黑色燃料：木炭。炭素。炭笔。炭画。
像炭的东西：山楂炭。
煤：石炭。焦炭。泥炭。
冰

炭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tàn］
［《廣韻》他旦切，去翰，透。］
(1)木炭。由木材烧成的黑色燃料。
(2)灰。
(3)炭火。比喻灾祸。
(4)方言。石炭。即煤炭。
(5)化学名词。指二氧化碳。
(6)姓。汉代有炭遮。见《汉书·西域传》。

炭字的英文翻译

◎ 炭
char, charcoal

炭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　炭； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页668第24
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】他案切【正韻】他晏切，?音歎。【說文】燒木餘也。从火，岸省聲。【玉篇】灺也，火也。【禮·月令】草木黃落，乃伐薪爲炭。　又塗炭，塗泥也。炭，火也。【書·仲虺之誥】民墜塗炭。　又蜃炭。【周禮·秋官·赤犮氏】掌除牆屋，以蜃炭攻之。　又【正字通】石炭，卽今西北所燒之煤。【前漢·地理志】豫章郡出石，可燃爲薪。【徐陵春情詩】石炭擣輕紈。　又烰炭，俗作麩炭。【白居易詩】日暮半爐麩炭火。【本草】煎藥焙火宜用麩炭。　又懸炭，古?氣法也。【後漢·律曆志】權土炭放隂陽。日冬至陽氣應則景長極，黃鐘通土炭，輕而衡仰。日夏至隂氣應，則景短極，蕤賔通土炭，重而衡低。【淮南子·天文訓】水勝，故夏至濕。火勝，故冬至燥。燥，故炭輕，濕，故炭重。【梁?文帝詩】月暈蘆灰缺，秋還縣炭枯。　又姓。【西京雜記】炭虯，長安人。

炭字的源字形

炭字的起名意思

将木材封置与外部空气隔离，加高热可烧成的一种黑色燃料。也指像炭的东西。

carbon
Basic explanation of words
carbon
tàn
A black fuel that isolates wood from the air and burns with high heat: charcoal. Carbon. charcoal. Charcoal painting.
Something like charcoal: Hawthorn charcoal.
Coal: Carboniferous. Coke. peat.
ice
carbon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tàn］
["Guangyun" he cuts, goes to Han, and thoroughly. ]
(1) Charcoal. Black fuel made from wood.
(2) Ash.
(3) Charcoal fire. Metaphor of disaster.
(4) Dialects. Coal. That is coal.
(5) Chemical nouns. Refers to carbon dioxide.
(6) Last name. There were charcoal shelters in the Han Dynasty. See "Hanshu·Biography of the Western Regions".
carbon

◎ Charcoal
char, charcoal
carbon

[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　 Tan; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 668 Page 24
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] He cuts his case [Zheng Yun] He cuts, and sighs. [Said the text] Burning wood and more. From the fire, save the sound from the shore. [Jade articles] Hao Ye, Fire Ye. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】The grass and trees fall yellow, which means cutting the salary for charcoal.　 Put charcoal and mud again. Charcoal, fire too. 【Book·Zhongzhu Zhizhi】The people fall into charcoal.　A mirage again. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Chisuan Family】Pull away the wall house and attack it with a mirage.　[Zhengzitong] Carbon coal, the coal burned in the northwest. [Pre-Han·Geography] Yuzhang County found stones, which is combustible as salary. [Xu Lingchun Love Poems] Carbon coal pounded lightly.　Also charcoal, commonly known as bran charcoal. [Bai Juyi Poems] Half furnace bran charcoal fire at sunset. 【Materia Medica】Bran charcoal is suitable for decocting and baking.　Hanging the charcoal again, the ancient Qi method is also. [Later Han·Lü Zhi] Quan Tu Tan puts Yin and Yang. In the winter solstice, the Yang Qi should be the longest view of the scenery, and the yellow bell should be light and steady. In the summer and summer solstice, the yin air should respond, the scenery is very short, the bladder is connected to the earth charcoal, and the weight is low. [Huainanzi·Tiantian Training] Water wins, so the summer solstice is wet. Fire wins, so winter solstice is dry. Dry, so the charcoal is light, and wet, so the charcoal is heavy. [Liang? Wendi Poems] The moon is hazy and the reed is lacking in ash, and the autumn is still the county with charcoal.　Another last name. [Xijing Miscellaneous Notes] Charcoal Qiu, from Chang'an.
carbon
Source glyph
carbon
Name meaning
It is a black fuel that can be burned by sealing the wood from the outside air and increasing the heat. Also refers to things like charcoal.
形声字。火表意,表示炭用火烧制而成,以及炭可燃烧;岸(an)省声,表示炭状如崖岸的岩石。本义是木炭。
①木炭:~火|~盆|烧~。②像炭的东西:山楂~。③
煤:煤~「石~|泥~。

火~ 焦~ 木~ 熟~ 涂~ 生灵涂~ 雪中送~
炭
tàn
心,族,发,炭。
Пиктофонетические символы.
Огонь означает, что древесный уголь создается огнем, и древесный уголь можно сжигать; банка (ан) означает, что древесный уголь подобен камню на обрыве утеса.
Первоначальное значение - древесный уголь.
① Уголь: ~ Огонь | ~ Сковорода | Гореть ~.
②Что-то вроде древесного угля: боярышник ~.
③Уголь: уголь ~ "камень ~ | грязь ~. ~ Пер ~ хуа ~ цзин ~ белый ~ трава ~ кость ~ ~ черный ~"
Огонь ~ Обгоревший ~ Древесина ~ Приготовленная ~ Раскрашенная ~ Краска жизни ~ Доставленная в снегу ~
углерод
Сердце, семья, волосы, уголь.
tàn
1) уголь (древесный, диал. также каменный)
烧了一块炭 сжечь кусок угля
2) сажа, копоть
涂炭 грязь и сажа
3) Тань (фамилия)
Radicals: 山, 厂, 火  (mountain, cliff, fire)
Meaning Mnemonic
You climb up a mountain and a cliff in search of fire, but all you find is charcoal. You can make fire with the charcoal, but you were hoping to find fire itself. All that climbing for nothing.
You’re angry that you could only find charcoal so you take the charcoal in your hands and you crush it atop the cliff on the mountain. Feel the charcoal breaking in your hands as the wind carries the charcoal dust off from the top of the cliff on the mountain.
Reading Mnemonic
After crushing the charcoal, you decide to take advantage of your current location and lay out in the sun for a while to get a tan (たん). Instead of getting a tan though, you catch on fire. Oops.
Imagine lying out in the sun next to the crushed charcoal, thinking you’re going to get tan. You’re very surprised when you actually catch on fire. Hot hot hot!
